content: the socks are straightforward to knit though you ll need to work a crochet edging and feel confident to make a knitted trim for the mouth and teeth so while they re not a project for beginners they ll be well within the reach of intermediate knitters and well worth the effort -fiona goble knitted animal socks and hats the recommended yarn is suggested to be grey #8509 and you will need 1 2 skeins to make the s m pair in addition you will need a small amount of light worsted dk yarn in white to construct the teeth of the sharks as to materials you will require * a pair of 4mm knitting needles * a set of 4 4mm double-pointed knitting needles dpns * 4mm crochet or similar size * stitch holder * stitch marker * yarn sewing needle * large-eyed embroidery needle * 4 x 3/8 10mm shiny black shank buttons for the sharks eyes
